DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL EARNINGS : FORTUNE PETROLEUM ' S LOSS WIDENS IN 1ST QUARTER
DOC.TEXT: Fortune Petroleum Corp. , an Agoura Hills oil and gas exploration and production company , said its first-quarter loss widened to $ 135 # 000 compared with a loss of $ 70 # 000 in the same period a year earlier.Revenue was $ 812 # 000 for the quarter that ended March 31 , up 49 % from $ 545 # 000 the year before . The company attributed the results in part to increased production . The company has also said it is responding to falling oil prices by spending more for natural_gas exploration .
